data.persona: I am a farmer.  I grow wheat for the kingdom.  Most of the wheat is used to make bread.  I sell much of it to bakers.
data.description:
You are in the Tavern of Browntavia.
Browntavia Tavern is not brown at all.  It is made of wood and looks like a broken shack.  Outside is  a huge watering hole for horses and dogs.  Visually it doesn't look like much but inside the chairs have a special design and have carvings of horses and farm work on the back of each chair.
There's a wooden table and a chair here.
The worker is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a clothes.

data.short_motivation: I want to hit the worker to punish him for being in the tavern.
data.mid_motivation: I need to punish the worker so that he'll return to the field and finish his work for the day.
data.long_motivation: I have to stay on top of the workers, and if I allow one to knock off for drinking before the workday ends, they'll all expect the ability to leave at any time.
